programme.title: Live Premier League
programme.desc: Leeds United v Manchester United (Kick-off 12.30pm). All the action from the match at Elland Road. The sides last met here in February 2023, when late goals by Marcus Rashford and Alejandro Garnacho gave the visitors a 2-0 win, but neither of those players are currently at the club, and Leeds will hope for a competitive display in front of their own fans.

programme.desc: The Raptors host the Hawks as they look to sweep the season series at Scotiabank Arena. Toronto has already bested Atlanta twice this season, led by Scottie Barnes. Jalen Johnson is leading Atlanta in both points (23.7 PPG) and rebounds (10.4 RPG).

programme.title: Live: NFL Football
programme.desc: The Packers visit the Vikings at U.S. Bank Stadium. Green Bay clinched a playoff spot, while Minnesota seeks a five-game winning streak. Quarterbacks Jordan Love and J.J. McCarthy manage injuries, as the Packers look to snap a three-game losing skid.

programme.title: Live: NFL Football
programme.desc: The Broncos host the Chargers. Bo Nix leads Denver with 25 passing touchdowns. Justin Herbert anchors the visitors. Promising rushers J.K. Dobbins (Denver) and Kimani Vidal (Chargers) manage recent injuries. Denver seeks the AFC top seed.

programme.title: Live: Football Night in America
programme.desc: "Football Night in America" features host Maria Taylor, Hall of Fame head coach Tony Dungy, former NFL head coach and quarterback Jason Garrett, former NFL quarterback Chris Simms and NFL insider Mike Florio recapping the day's NFL highlights. Co-host Jac Collinsworth and two-time Super Bowl champion Rodney Harrison contribute on-site each week.

programme.title: Live: NFL Football
programme.desc: The Ravens and Steelers clash at Acrisure Stadium with the AFC North title on the line. The winner claims the division crown, while the loser is eliminated. Baltimore quarterback Lamar Jackson returns to the lineup after a back contusion.

programme.title: NFL Live
programme.desc: Host Laura Rutledge takes the helm of this weekday show featuring the likes of Marcus Spears, Dan Orlovsky, Mina Kimes, and Adam Schefter. The "NFL Live" crew entertains fans while offering all the latest news and analysis from across the NFL.

programme.title: Motorcycle Experience
programme.desc: Dave Hatch and Emily Roberts share their passion for the sport as they interview motorcycle enthusiasts, share hard won tips and tricks, review the latest bikes, and travel to some of the best riding locations across North America.

programme.title: Live: Pardon the Interruption
programme.desc: The debate is the story in this fast-paced, half-hour series hosted by former Washington Post sportswriters Tony Kornheiser and Michael Wilbon. The pair engage in high-energy discussions, conduct interviews and often argue over topics not even related to sports. Other sports reporters appear as guests and offer opinions on the top stories of the day.

programme.desc: Severide hides his serious shoulder injury as he tries to rescue a construction worker from a collapsed building; two teens are trapped in a vehicle.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: Casey must decide whether to turn in a cop's son who paralyzed a teen in a drunken-driving accident; Severide learns he has a fractured vertebra; Mills is torn between his mother and the job.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: Chief Boden faces accusations that he abandoned a homeless man to die in a warehouse fire; Severide helps an elderly woman; Detective Voight tries to convince Casey not to testify against his son; Shay has to face her ex during a call.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: Casey must face the consequences of confronting Detective Voight; Dawson faces disciplinary action; Severide reaches out to an old friend about his injury.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: Dawson receives help from a girl she saved; Detective Voight is determined to get Casey to retract his statement.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: The Firehouse 51 crew has a Thanksgiving to remember when drugs, a car accident, and a gang shooting get in the way of traditional holiday pastimes.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: Peter is deeply upset when a young victim is discovered at the site of a train accident; an abusive mother takes dire actions; Severide's injury is aggravated.

programme.desc: Benson and Stabler begin to question the story of a missing teenager (Ellen Woglom) who returns home after four years, claiming to have been kept as a sex slave in a concrete cell.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A mute girl is raped and beaten, and her drawing of her attacker resembles a local priest.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: An artist's shocking death leads detectives to uncover a long string of murders by an elusive serial killer.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The investigation into a home invasion that ended with two dead leads to a shocking revelation about Detective Rollins.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a crime scene photo of a murdered teenage girl quickly becomes an Internet phenomenon, the police initiate an investigation with the victim's father, who points the detectives toward his daughter's therapist.

programme.desc: The SVU begins investigating members of a top youth hockey team after a savage hazing takes place in a locker room.

programme.desc: The cops get tangled in an elaborate online hoax that leads to the rape of a popular social media star; Benson sets new ground rules with Sheila.

programme.desc: Emotions run high as the squad embarks on a frantic search for Benson's missing son.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A college student becomes a target after her work as an online porn star is discovered by her classmates.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When detective Tutuola finds security footage of a sportscaster being physically abusive to his girlfriend, Benson seeks help from Assistant DA Barba to convince the victim to fight back.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The media spotlight shines on Sgt. Benson when she investigates a string of rapes that have similarities with crimes in Atlanta; a family court judge threatens to remove baby Noah from Benson's care.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The SVU begins investigating members of a top youth hockey team after a savage hazing takes place in a locker room.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson walks into a hostage situation at a neighborhood restaurant; Rollins tries to help her father after he's hospitalized.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A serial pedophile murders members of a family and kidnaps the two younger children.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Detective Benson goes under cover to combat terrorist activities; a victim refuses a rape kit.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A woman is found dead in Central Park, and when the medical examiner can find no apparent cause of death, Stabler starts investigating the victim's husband (Chris Sarandon) and his friends.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A cancer patient (Brian Dennehy) makes a deathbed confession involving a number of crimes from decades earlier.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A bitter separation pits a husband and wife (Blair Underwood, Michael Michele) against each other as they try to gain custody of their daughter (Tiffany Evans).

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Fin is asked to look into a case of rape at his son's college, where he meets a Brooklyn detective (Adam Beach) who is investigating a similar crime.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When an envelope containing a picture appears at the precinct, the detectives pick up the trail of a child pornographer.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a mob lawyer (Cary Elwes) and his wife are attacked, their young son is the only witness; when he comes out of surgery, the man vividly remembers his daughter at the crime scene.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A local police captain (Kim Delaney) questions Benson when she investigates a rape outside her jurisdiction.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Detectives believe a woman's death to be a professional hit when they discover that terrorists have threatened her CIA-agent fiance (Dylan Walsh).

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
